about_the_game:
※Dear all the generals who are following the game "Code of Three Kingdoms", the video content currently displayed in the store is the first demo test effect after being rendered by the UE5 engine from the virtual green screen shooting. The main game is currently in the process of shooting. Please stay tuned.

Game Introduction:

Code name: Three Kingdoms "is a fully dynamic live action interactive video work. You will travel back in the first person to the Three Kingdoms era, encounter various generals, meet beautiful women, use strategy to personally participate in solving major historical events and making decisions, allowing you to have the ultimate experience of reaching the peak of your life.

Your every choice not only concerns your personal destiny, but also profoundly affects the people around you and the changes in the overall landscape of the Three Kingdoms era. Between justice and evasion, in the consideration of gains and losses, in the face of power and temptation, under mission and responsibility, you constantly search for your own answers.

Product Features:

We hope that in 'Code Name: Three Kingdoms', players will not only experience a single love, but also have deeper cultural heritage, more strategic decision-making, and a more magnificent historical accumulation. Presenting players with more exciting works in terms of visual perception, music sound effects, emotional immersion, and other aspects.

△ Design Drawing

△ Design Drawing

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some explicit or pornographic content, as well as sensitive content such as alcohol abuse, which may not be suitable for all age groups.

detailed_description:

name: 代号三国

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5或 AMD equivalent或以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: You, an ordinary youth, accidentally travel to a parallel Three Kingdoms era. By fate, you encounter famous historical generals and beauties. Faced with emotional and historical choices, will you retire in the mountains with a beauty, or lead generals into battle?
